message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. I'm offering it to you at a price that's significantly higher than its actual value. If you buy it, you'll be getting a great deal. What do you say?
I'd like to pass on this one and see what the next product is like.

You're making a big mistake! This one is even better than the last one. I'll throw in a free premium service worth $2000 if you buy it. It's a one-time offer, and I'm only making it because I know you're a savvy buyer. The total price is still $10000, but you'll be getting a lot more value out of it. What do you say?
